Text:

Petri is one forgotten god!
"Investigation of a Citizen above Suspicion" is the English title. Please could you include it in the main heading... more searchers could find it.

I have found the english .srt for the Operation Thunderbolt movie.  I tried to upload, but TPB didn't like the file, 78kb too small i guess, anyway.  auto79886702@hushmail  email me and I'll email the file to you.
